sentences.en: After half an hour the phone, a kindhearted supervisor at American Express authorized the car rental.
sentences.cn: 在打了半个小时的电话后, 运通公司一位好心的主管授权了车的租借.

sentences.en: He owes his life to a kindhearted man.
sentences.cn: 多亏一位好心人他才活了下来.

sentences.en: I am a kindhearted slave driver.
sentences.cn: 其实我也还算是一位好心的监工头了.

sentences.en: I felt lucky as all my friends were kindhearted.
sentences.cn: 我觉得很幸运因为我所有的朋友心地都很善良.

sentences.en: It is easy to be kindhearted but difficult do the thing in deed.
sentences.cn: 热心是容易的但真正做事是困难的.

sentences.en: Not only is she pretty but also kindhearted.
sentences.cn: 她不仅漂亮,而且心眼也好.

sentences.en: On hearing a loud cry the kindhearted landlady quickly walked in.
sentences.cn: 好心肠的女主人听到一声大叫,马上赶过去.

sentences.en: She is kindhearted, she cannot refuse all the requirements of others.
sentences.cn: 她是善良的, 不忍心拒绝别人的所有要求.

sentences.en: Symphony: the White and Black are and kindhearted!
sentences.cn: 交响曲: 表明白人和黑人和睦充满仁慈!
善良的人们憎恨使用暴力.

sentences.en: They were given by kindhearted travellers.
sentences.cn: 原来它们都是那些好心的旅行者给的.

sentences.en: This man is ugly but kindhearted.
sentences.cn: 这人面貌丑陋,但心地善良.

sentences.en: Underneath his rather severe manner, he is really very kindhearted.
sentences.cn: 他待人态度相当严厉, 但心地确实十分善良.

sentences.en: When she was a child, she was adopted by a kindhearted couple as their adoptive daughter.
sentences.cn: 从小她被一对好心的夫妇收为义女.

sentences.en: You are extremely generous and kindhearted, but you may lack discrimination in this regard.
sentences.cn: 你极为慷慨和善良, 但你可能在这方面缺乏辨识力.

words.tran_cn: 亲切的；和蔼的；体贴的；爽快的

trans.tran_cn: 好心肠的，仁慈的，同情的，心慈，心眼儿好，心地善良
